__e: The last time that I was called to his office, it was after school, and I was in the classroom with Sister Cathy and my sister was with me.
"Cathy," and I was like, "Whatever," for long enough and then one day, I just thought, "Bollocks to this,"
There's an on-the-record public story of what happened to Sister Cathy, and then there's the world beneath that was actually being lived.
My elevator inside me is dropping down very rapidly, because up here, I know Cathy did not bring this car back here.
- I don't believe life comes back... once it's died and calls again to the living.
Well, Cathy, it's not just the two of us that we have to consider anymore.
